channel.title: The Tor Project receives FSF Award

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
Hi phobos!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
That's a super very good news!!!!!!!!! The Free Software Foundation is a very good and very important organization!!!!! founded by Richard Stallman!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! one of the two best software programmer in the world (together with Linus!!!) and probably the most clever and smart person in the world!!!!!! YEAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! So, awards from the FSF are very great!!!!!!!!! super!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
That's the most important Award the TOR PROJECT has ever received!!!!!!!!!!! and actually, it's the only one noteworthy for real!!!!!!!!

bye!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
~bee!!!!!!!

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 2
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
Yes the Firefox add-on torbutton at this time dose not work in version 4

But you can have a the same thing by install installing torbutton from the Tor web site: https://www.torproject.org/ Which will work in Firefox 4

Good luck
Paul

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 3
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
Hi
I know that my comment is irrelevant to this topic but since i downloaded Mozilla Firefox 4, Tor Button is no longer supported in this browser and i can't use it.
I live in Iran and in this country there is a filtering system that filters every thing in the internet. Please do an immediate action so that Firefox 4 can support Tor Button.

Thanks

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 5
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
The latest torbutton alpha works with Firefox 4 final.

https://www.torproject.org/torbutton/releases/torbutton-1.3.2-alpha.xpi

However, this version is an unstable version, I'm not sure you should use it in Iran. You could either downgrade to Firefox 3.6, or run both side-by-side. In that case, you would need to use separate Firefox profiles for each.

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 8
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Congrats TOR! Well deserved. I feel honored to use your software. Thanks!

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 10
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
Congratulations tor project. Job well done.

I think the tor project is the best innovative free software you can download. I will vote for it in any online software contest. You have to live in a censored country to feel it and give me thumbs up for choosing the tor project as the best.
